Posts.Content: suedonny wrote: I had a stereotactic biopsy two years ago which left me with a hematoma that left residual lump, my mammogram showed a small density that was partially encapsulated at biopsy site associated with biopsy .Had to have diagnostic film and sonography, awaiting results, Is this scar tissue , it was a bad painful biopsy with a lot of bleeding.Im worried and waiting for results.ANyone know if scar tissue looks like cancer? Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: follow up to stereotactic biopsy suedonny leaf
